Description: Rectangular wooden writing-board perforated in one corner, bearing Coptic text. Contains Anaphora of St. Mark and prayer of fraction.
Curator's comments: TM 107903; T.BM 54036 Quecke 1971: 40-54; Henner 2000: 26; Lanne 1958: 292-299; Worp 2012: 58, nos. 400 & 401; Cuming 1990: 64-65. Studied with a view to publication by Mihálykó, 2021.
